title: how can I make significant improvement for my English?

replies.msg:
I saw many foreigners they speak English so well, however I believed that my English it’s just so ordinary(not so academic and university level)
Especially when I answering questions, my grammar as well as my oral skills are extremely poor.
I’ve checked many synonyms through the internet like happy (grim) run(dash, sprint) but still has no significant improvements
點算？
What can I do now
watch more porn

標題名 for my English speaking skills
As the spaces are not enough

You probably need to first have SVO concept in mind.

In your short text above, you either miss a verb or there are two in one sentence

講
聽 係三樣野黎可以分開練
英文國家好多黑人或者低下階層英文好流利但識字好少成日錯語法
如果你只要識講搵西人講就得 包你流利但可以錯好多GRAMMAR
但要講得好用PROPER ENGLISH 你就要睇多啲文，同多啲西人交流

replies.msg: I am lack of vocabulary too! But I think first of all, you need to fix your grammatically mistakes.

無奇蹟，純粹百屌成材，係咁講係咁用啦。
柒係會柒, 但實戰最深刻。

另外方法，就係記低一啲你好需要用既句子，詞語，對住鏡背，講一次。係好戇鳩，都係work. 一有情況出現，你可以會本能講出黎，唔洗諗.

要長遠進步，唔好迫自己好快用好多唔同既字。由你生活，工作所需一個字一個字慢慢學。盡量留意人地用咩字，句子構成。抄低佢，背，嘗試用。

每日就算1%進步都足夠，唔好冇進步就得。

quote.msg:
無奇蹟，純粹百屌成材，係咁講係咁用啦。
柒係會柒, 但實戰最深刻。

另外方法，就係記低一啲你好需要用既句子，詞語，對住鏡背，講一次。係好戇鳩，都係work. 一有情況出現，你可以會本能講出黎，唔洗諗.

要長遠進步，唔好迫自己好快用好多唔同既字。由你生活，工作所需一個字一個字慢慢學。盡量留意人地用咩字，句子構成。抄低佢，背，嘗試用。

每日就算1%進步都足夠，唔好冇進步就得。

replies.msg:
Try reading newspaper on a daily basis and make it a habit(not tabloids)

Do it everyday for a month and I am pretty sure there will at least be some improvements

quote.msg: For what purpose? Business presentation?
General conversation and slightly for writing purposes

replies.msg:
For everyday conversation, just talk to people naturally and confidently. Native speakers usually speak very simple English, like: "it", "this", "that". Sometimes, it's not hurt to ask people politely, "I'm sorry. Can you say it again?". "I beg your pardon?"
For writing simple sentences, the automatic spelling and grammar checking functions that comes with the computer web browser and word processor can help you to write correct sentences. It will be more complicated to write outstanding things. It take some time to read more books (fiction or non-fiction), newspaper and articles on the internet in order to build up your writing style and vocabulary.

Watch english dramas and repeat every dialogue in your mind.
Subconsciously you are gonna pick up grammar and phrases that are widely used by the native speakers.
